metadata.title: CVE-2024-42095 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:serial: 8250_omap: Implementation of Errata i2310As per Errata i2310[0], Erroneous timeout can be triggered,if this Erroneous interrupt is not cleared then it may leadsto storm of interrupts, therefore apply Errata i2310 solution.[0] https://www.ti.com/lit/pdf/sprz536 page 23

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
